document.heading: Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1990 Amendment Act of 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-46, the “Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1990 Amendment Act of 1989,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-319, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 27, 1989 and July 11, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 1, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-79 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

ACT 8 7 9 IN THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA AUG 0 989 To amend the District of Columbia Real Property Tax Revision Act of 1974 to establish the real property tax rates and real property special tax rates on taxable real property for tax year 1990, to adopt certain reports submitted by the Mayor regarding real property taxes and other major taxes, and to amend the payment provisions for the real property tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1990 Amendment Act of 1989" Sec. 2. The District of Columbia Real Property Tax Revision Act of 1974, approved September 3, 1974 (88 Stat. 1051; D.C. Code, sec. 47-801 et seq is amended as follows a) Section 411 (D.C. Code, sec. 47-811) is amended by striking the period following the phrase "March 31st" and inserting the phrase except that for the tax year beginning July I, 1989, and ending June 30, 1990, the amount of the Ist and 2nd installments shall reflect and be consistent with the tax rates applicable to that tax year, as provided in section 412(b) and (c b) Section 412(b D.C. Code, sec. 47-812(b is amended to read as follows b)(1) The following real property tax rates are established for taxable real property in the District of Columbia for that portion of tax year 1990 beginning July I, 1989 and ending September 30, 1989 A 0.8648 for each $i00 of assessed value for class I property B 1.0425 for each $100 of assessed value for class 2 property C 1.2327 for each $I00 of assessed value for class 3 property; and Section 47-811 Section 47-812 0 0 I ¯ r~ t 0 0 ¯ 0 ¯ 0 0 E~olled Statutes-at-Large, or the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations i Cia’~ rman Council of theDistrict of Columbia A ROVED: August 1, 1989 3 Item on Consent Calendar ACTION & DATE: VOICE VOTE: COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA Council Period Eight RECORD OF OFFICIAL COUNCIL VOTE DOCKET NO: Bill 8-319 Adopted First Reading, 6-27-89 Approved Recordedvoteonrequest Absent: all present C] ROLL CALL VOTE RESULT COUNCIL MEMBER AYE NAY N.V.A.B.
